Title: LK 2 Pack for Google Pixel 8 Screen Protector with 2 Pack Camera Lens Protector

Description: 
Protect your Google Pixel 8 with this LK 2 Pack Screen Protector and Camera Lens Protector. The package includes 2x Tempered Glass Screen Protectors, 2x Camera Lens Protectors, and Installation Accessories for easy application. 

The screen protector features 9H Hardness Tempered Glass material, ensuring maximum protection against scratches and shatter. It is HD Ultra-thin, maintaining the original visual quality of your device. The edge strengthening design provides added durability, while the fingerprint compatibility allows for easy unlocking. The screen protector is also high-response haptic touch sensitive, enhancing your touch experience.

The camera lens protector is made with the same 9H Hardness Tempered Glass material and is scratch resistant and shatterproof, ensuring your camera lens stays protected.

With this LK screen protector and camera lens protector, you can enjoy a high definition visual experience, with the original quality of your device maintained. Additionally, you will receive lifetime service with customer support, ensuring your satisfaction with the product.

Compatible with Google Pixel 8, this LK 2 Pack Screen Protector with Camera Lens Protector is the perfect choice for keeping your device safe and secure.
